Activity: Arrive at the office, check emails, and prioritize bug reports from yesterday's testing.
Continue executing test cases, focusing on UI elements. Verify functionality, appearance, and responsiveness of all UI components.
Conduct ad-hoc testing of the UI, exploring different navigation paths and input methods. Try to break the UI by inputting invalid data or performing unexpected actions.
Begin testing level layouts. Check for collision issues, navigation problems, and ensure that objectives are placed correctly and function as intended.
Document any bugs or issues found during UI and level layout testing in the bug tracking system. Provide detailed descriptions and steps to reproduce.

Prepare a preliminary report summarizing testing progress and highlighting any significant issues found so far. Include data on the number of test cases executed, the number of bugs found, and their severity levels.
End of day. Leave the office.
